reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Get all the selected import account options and store to a list.
Open the mpx platform.
Enter 'mpx/AdminPub7QA' in the 'Username' text box.
Enter 'Pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Click the 'Choose Files' button.
Click the 'Movies' button in the OS Upload dialog.
Click the Test Movie in th OS Upload dialog.
Click the 'Open' button.
Click the 'Upload' button in the Upload dialog.
Click the 'Available Date' label on the right hand side to give focus to the media item.
Enter '3/12/2014 12:00 AM' in the 'Available Date' text box.
Enter 'Automation530c096177' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter '3/25/2014 12:00 AM' in the 'Expiration Date' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Publish' button.
Click the 'Publish to Pub 7 Primary' check box.
Click the 'Publish' button from the upload dialog.
Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Cron ran successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title Automation530c096177.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the text of the first search result set item.
Get the title text of every result in the search result set.
For each expected result, assert it is present in the result set.
Verify the text '03/12/2014 - 04:00 AM' is present on the page.
Verify the text '03/25/2014 - 04:00 AM' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Expired' is present on the page.
Click the first search title link in the search result set.
Verify the text 'Automation530c096177' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Wednesday, March 12, 2014 - 04:00' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Tuesday, March 25, 2014 - 04:00' is present on the page.
Click the 'Edit' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit mpx_video_16 Automation530c096177 dialog'.
Verify the value of the 'Available Date' text box equals '03/12/2014'.
Verify the value of the 'Expiration Date' text box equals '03/25/2014'.
Click the 'Schedule' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Automation530c096177 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled revision table is empty.
Open the mpx platform.
Enter 'Automation530c096177' in the 'Search' text box.
Click the 'Search by Title' link.
Click the 'Available Date' label on the right hand side to give focus to the media item.
Enter '4/01/2014 12:00 AM' in the 'Available Date' text box.
Enter '4/01/2015 12:00 AM' in the 'Expiration Date' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Additional Options' arrow.
Click the 'Publish Update' link.
Click the 'Publish to Pub 7 Primary' check box.
Click the 'Update' button.
Open url 'http://qa5.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Cron ran successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Enter title Automation530c096177.
Click the 'Apply' button.
Get the title text of every result in the search result set.
For each expected result, assert it is present in the result set.
Verify the text '04/01/2014 - 04:00 AM' is present on the page.
Verify the text '04/01/2015 - 04:00 AM' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Published' is present on the page.
Click the first search title link in the search result set.
Verify the text 'Automation530c096177' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Tuesday, April 1, 2014 - 04:00' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Wednesday, April 1, 2015 - 04:00' is present on the page.
Click the 'Edit' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Edit mpx_video_16 Automation530c096177 dialog'.
Verify the value of the 'Available Date' text box equals '04/01/2014'.
Verify the value of the 'Expiration Date' text box equals '04/01/2015'.
Click the 'Schedule' tab.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Automation530c096177 dialog'.
Verify the 'Run now' button is present.
Verify the text 'Automation530c096177' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Unpublish' is present on the page.
Verify the text '04/01/2015 - 04:00' is present on the page.
